catalog.title: Catalog
catalog.description: Name of the VCD catalog in which the VM template is stored.

items.description: IPv4 address range, in CIDR notation.

effect.title: Node taint effect
effect.description: One of NoSchedule, PreferNoSchedule or NoExecute.

key.title: Node taint key
key.description: Name of the label on a node.

value.title: Node taint value
value.description: Value of the label identified by the key.

placementPolicy.title: VM placement policy
placementPolicy.description: Name of the VCD VM placement policy to use.

sizingPolicy.title: Sizing policy
sizingPolicy.description: Name of the VCD sizing policy to use.

storageProfile.title: Storage profile
storageProfile.description: Name of the VCD storage profile to use.

template.title: Template
template.description: Name of the template used to create the node VMs.

cluster.title: Cluster
cluster.description: Helm values for the provider-independent cluster chart.

unit.description: Provides CoreOS metadata for dependent services.

connectivity.title: Connectivity
connectivity.description: Configurations related to cluster connectivity such as container registries.

containerRegistries.title: Container registries
containerRegistries.description: Endpoints and credentials configuration for container registries.

auth.title: Auth
auth.description: Base64-encoded string from the concatenation of the username, a colon, and the password.

identitytoken.title: Identity token
identitytoken.description: Used to authenticate the user and obtain an access token for the registry.

password.title: Password
password.description: Used to authenticate for the registry with username/password.

username.title: Username
username.description: Used to authenticate for the registry with username/password.

connectivity.title: Connectivity
connectivity.description: Configurations related to cluster connectivity such as container registries.

containerRegistries.title: Container registries
containerRegistries.description: Endpoints and credentials configuration for container registries.

auth.title: Auth
auth.description: Base64-encoded string from the concatenation of the username, a colon, and the password.

identitytoken.title: Identity token
identitytoken.description: Used to authenticate the user and obtain an access token for the registry.

password.title: Password
password.description: Used to authenticate for the registry with username/password.

username.title: Username
username.description: Used to authenticate for the registry with username/password.

localRegistryCache.title: Local registry cache
localRegistryCache.description: Caching container registry within the cluster.

enabled.title: Enable
enabled.description: Enabling this will deploy the Zot registry service in the cluster. To make use of it as a pull-through cache, you also have to specify registries to cache images for.

mirroredRegistries.title: Registries to cache
mirroredRegistries.description: Here you must specify each registry to cache container images for. Please also make sure to have an entry for each registry in Global > Components > Containerd > Container registries.

port.title: Service port
port.description: NodePort used by the local registry service.

extraOvdcNetworks.title: Extra OVDC networks
extraOvdcNetworks.description: OVDC networks to attach VMs to, additionally.

vipSubnet.title: Virtual IP subnet
vipSubnet.description: Virtual IP CIDR for the external network.

destination.title: Destination
destination.description: IPv4 address range in CIDR notation.

ntp.title: Time synchronization (NTP)
ntp.description: Servers/pools to synchronize this cluster's clocks with.

proxy.title: Proxy
proxy.description: Whether/how outgoing traffic is routed through proxy servers.

httpProxy.title: HTTP proxy
httpProxy.description: HTTP proxy - To be passed to the HTTP_PROXY environment variable in all hosts.

httpsProxy.title: HTTPS proxy
httpsProxy.description: HTTPS proxy - To be passed to the HTTPS_PROXY environment variable in all hosts.

noProxy.title: No proxy
noProxy.description: No proxy - Comma-separated addresses to be passed to the NO_PROXY environment variable in all hosts.

secretName.title: Secret name
secretName.description: Name of a secret resource used by containerd to obtain the HTTP_PROXY, HTTPS_PROXY, and NO_PROXY environment variables. If empty the value will be defaulted to <clusterName>-cluster-values.

osUsers.title: OS Users
osUsers.description: Configuration for OS users in cluster nodes.

sudo.title: Sudoers configuration
sudo.description: Permissions string to add to /etc/sudoers for this user.

sshTrustedUserCAKeys.title: Trusted SSH cert issuers
sshTrustedUserCAKeys.description: CA certificates of issuers that are trusted to sign SSH user certificates.

catalog.title: Catalog
catalog.description: VCD catalog where the VM template is stored.

certSANs.title: Subject alternative names (SAN)
certSANs.description: Alternative names to encode in the API server's certificate.

diskSizeGB.title: Disk size
diskSizeGB.description: Control plane node root volume size, in GB.

image.title: Node container image
image.description: Set to 'gsoci.azurecr.io/giantswarm' for ignition (Flatcar) and 'projects.registry.vmware.com/tkg' for cloud-init (Ubuntu).

caFile.title: Certificate authority file
caFile.description: Path to identity provider's CA certificate in PEM format.

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: OIDC client identifier to identify with.

groupsClaim.title: Groups claim
groupsClaim.description: Name of the identity token claim bearing the user's group memberships.

groupsPrefix.title: Groups prefix
groupsPrefix.description: Prefix prepended to groups values to prevent clashes with existing names.

issuerUrl.title: Issuer URL
issuerUrl.description: URL of the provider which allows the API server to discover public signing keys, not including any path. Discovery URL without the '/.well-known/openid-configuration' part.

usernameClaim.title: Username claim
usernameClaim.description: Name of the identity token claim bearing the unique user identifier.

usernamePrefix.title: Username prefix
usernamePrefix.description: Prefix prepended to username values to prevent clashes with existing names.

replicas.title: Number of nodes
replicas.description: Number of control plane instances to create. Must be an odd number.

resourceRatio.title: Resource ratio
resourceRatio.description: Ratio between node resources and apiserver resource requests.

managementCluster.title: Management cluster
managementCluster.description: Name of the Cluster API cluster managing this workload cluster.

description.title: Cluster description
description.description: User-friendly description of the cluster's purpose.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: These labels are added to the Kubernetes resources defining this cluster.

servicePriority.title: Service priority
servicePriority.description: The relative importance of this cluster.

nodePools.title: Node pools
nodePools.description: Groups of worker nodes with identical configuration.

diskSizeGB.description: Node root volume size, in GB.
Node root volume size, in GB.

enableVirtualServiceSharedIP.title: Share IPs in virtual services
enableVirtualServiceSharedIP.description: If enabled, multiple virtual services can share the same virtual IP address.

oneArm.title: One-arm
oneArm.description: If enabled, use an internal IP for the virtual service with a NAT rule to expose the external IP. Otherwise the virtual service will be exposed directly with the external IP.

storageClass.title: Pre-create storage class
storageClass.description: Pre-create storage class for the VCD CSI.

vcdStorageProfileName.title: Name of storage profile in VCD
Name of storage profile in VCD

ovdc.title: OvDC name
ovdc.description: Name of the organization virtual datacenter (OvDC) to create this cluster in.

site.title: Endpoint
site.description: VCD endpoint URL in the format https://VCD_HOST, without trailing slash.

secretName.title: Name
secretName.description: Name of the secret containing the VCD API token.

vmBootstrapFormat.title: Ignition or cloud-init for OS initialization
vmBootstrapFormat.description: Select either 'ignition' for Flatcar or 'cloud-config' for other OSes (e.g. Ubuntu).

vmNamingTemplate.title: VM naming template
vmNamingTemplate.description: Go template to specify the VM naming convention.

certSANs.title: Subject alternative names (SAN)
certSANs.description: Alternative names to encode in the API server's certificate.

enableAdmissionPlugins.title: Admission plugins
enableAdmissionPlugins.description: List of admission plugins to be passed to the API server via the --enable-admission-plugins flag.

enabled.title: Enable CiliumNetworkPolicies
enabled.description: Installs the network-policies-app (deny all by default) if set to true

kubectlImage.title: Kubectl image
kubectlImage.description: Used by cluster-shared library chart to configure coredns in-cluster.

kubernetesVersion.title: Kubernetes version
kubernetesVersion.description: For cloud-init (Ubuntu), append the version with '+vmware.1'.

parentUid.title: Management cluster UID
parentUid.description: If set, create the cluster from a specific management cluster associated with this UID.

rdeId.title: Runtime defined entity (RDE) identifier
rdeId.description: This cluster's RDE ID in the VCD API.

skipRde.title: Skip RDE
skipRde.description: Set to true if the API schema extension is installed in the correct version in VCD to create CAPVCD entities in the API. Set to false otherwise.

managementCluster.title: Management cluster name
managementCluster.description: The Cluster API management cluster that manages this cluster.
